title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. If a small image, such as an icon, is opened, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any action.
EB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars should be disabled and not movable. They should not have any effect on the displayed image.
SR:
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Verify that the scrollbars are disabled and cannot be moved.
4. Open a small image, such as an icon.
5. Confirm that the scrollbars continue to be disabled and have no effect on the displayed image.
